mapper.update: update t_agent set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, moblie = #{moblie,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=CHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select t.id as t_id, t.name as t_name, t.moblie as t_moblie, t.password as t_password, t.create_time as t_create_time, t.modify_time as t_modify_time from t_agent t where t.id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select t.id as t_id, t.name as t_name, t.moblie as t_moblie, t.password as t_password, t.create_time as t_create_time, t.modify_time as t_modify_time from t_agent t
select t.id as t_id, t.name as t_name, t.moblie as t_moblie, t.password as t_password, t.create_time as t_create_time, t.modify_time as t_modify_time from t_agent t
select t.id as t_id, t.name as t_name, t.moblie as t_moblie, t.password as t_password, t.create_time as t_create_time, t.modify_time as t_modify_time from t_agent t
select count(1) as totalNum from t_agent t
mapper.insert: insert into t_agent (id, name, moblie, password, create_time, modify_time) values #{item.id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.moblie,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.modifyTime,jdbcType=CHAR}
